data.text:
@hkfp Most people have mild symptoms and get well soon. It's ridiculous to impose so much restrictions which bring #HongKong society much more harm than the virus itself. 

#COVID19
@hkfp Hong Kong is finished..It will never recover sadly. Certainly not with a bunch of clowns running the show.  From a glorious international hub to just a 2nd world Chinese city.
@hkfp 你带着傲慢与偏见看向了中国，那你得到的结果也是带有偏见的，政治如何作秀都不会影响医疗体系的运转和一线工作人员的奋斗。我们需要提他们加油，而不是和你一样，在这里无病呻吟。
@rupperrt @RuoyuLi @heung_hang @hkfp LOL  just look at the SG vaccine rate and how abou HK?
@okilikecats @wayland42323899 @hkfp That person was asleep when common sense was being  given away.
@hkfp officials dont care as long as they tow the line and please their masters with this senseless  zero covid policy imposed in HK...when politics is placed over science
@RuoyuLi @heung_hang @hkfp How about Lee Hsien Loong. Everything SG did was smart, transparent and calm.
